topic: How to Automate Actions at The Design Space
type: Automating Actions - What is an Action?

definition.text: An Action is what is executed when users picks something from the menu of a Node.

paragraphs.text: These actions are implemented as functions inside a Function Library. So the basic workflow to implement a new action is the following:
Add Menu Item: First you need to add a Menu Item for the node type that will allow the user to execute your action.
Locate Function Library: Then you will need to locate the Function Library that is better suited to host the function that is going to be executed once the action is triggered.
Add your Code: Then you will write the code for that function.
Connect Menu Item to your Code: Finally you will connect the Menu Item to that function.
